jobActions.name: True Thrust
jobActions.description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 230.

jobActions.name: Vorpal Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130.
Combo Action: True Thrust or Raiden Thrust
Combo Potency: 280
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Life Surge
jobActions.description:
Ensures critical damage for first weaponskill used while Life Surge is active.
Duration: 5s
Increases damage dealt when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.
Effect cannot be applied to damage over time.
Additional Effect: Absorbs a portion of damage dealt as HP
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Piercing Talon
jobActions.description: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150.

jobActions.name: Disembowel
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: True Thrust or Raiden Thrust
Combo Potency: 250
Combo Bonus: Grants Power Surge
Power Surge Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Full Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Combo Action: Vorpal Thrust
Combo Potency: 380
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Lance Charge
jobActions.description:
Increases damage dealt by 10%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Jump
jobActions.description:
Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 320. Returns you to your original position after the attack is made.
Additional Effect: Grants Dive Ready
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Elusive Jump
jobActions.description:
Executes a jump to a location 15 yalms behind you.
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Doom Spike
jobActions.description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies in a straight line before you.

jobActions.name: Winged Glide
jobActions.description:
Rush to a targeted enemy's location.
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Chaos Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
140 when executed from a target's rear.
Combo Action: Disembowel
Combo Potency: 220
Rear Combo Potency: 260
Combo Bonus: Damage over time
Potency: 40
Duration: 24s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Dragonfire Dive
jobActions.description:
Delivers a jumping fire-based attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 500 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Dragon's Flight
Duration: 30s
Cannot be executed while bound.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Battle Litany
jobActions.description:
Increases critical hit rate of self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 20s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Fang and Claw
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
180 when executed from a target's flank.
Combo Action: Heavens' Thrust
Combo Potency: 300
Flank Combo Potency: 340
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Wheeling Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
180 when executed from a target's rear.
Combo Action: Chaotic Spring
Combo Potency: 300
Rear Combo Potency: 340
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Geirskogul
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 280 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Life of the Dragon
Life of the Dragon Effect: Increases damage dealt by 15%
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants 3 stacks of Nastrond Ready
Duration: 20s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Sonic Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Combo Action: Doom Spike or Draconian Fury
Combo Potency: 120
Combo Bonus: Grants Power Surge
Power Surge Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Drakesbane
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 440.
Combo Action: Wheeling Thrust or Fang and Claw
Combo Bonus: Grants Draconian Fire
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed after successfully landing Wheeling Thrust or Fang and Claw as a combo action.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Wheeling Thrust and Fang and Claw change to Drakesbane when requirements for execution are met.

jobActions.name: Mirage Dive
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Can only be executed when Dive Ready.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Nastrond
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 360 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while Nastrond Ready.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Coerthan Torment
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Combo Action: Sonic Thrust
Combo Potency: 150
Combo Bonus: Grants Draconian Fire
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: High Jump
jobActions.description:
Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 400. Returns you to your original position after the attack is made.
Additional Effect: Grants Dive Ready
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Raiden Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 320.
Additional Effect: Sharpens the Firstminds' Focus by 1
Can only be executed while under the effect of Draconian Fire.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※True Thrust changes to Raiden Thrust when requirements for execution are met.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Stardiver
jobActions.description:
Delivers a jumping fire-based attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 720 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Starcross Ready
Duration: 20s
Effect ends when Life of the Dragon expires.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Life of the Dragon.
Cannot be executed while bound.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Draconian Fury
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Additional Effect: Sharpens the Firstminds' Focus by 1
Can only be executed while under the effect of Draconian Fire.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Doom Spike changes to Draconian Fury when requirements for execution are met.

jobActions.name: Heavens' Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Lance Barrage
Combo Potency: 440
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Chaotic Spring
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
180 when executed from a target's rear.
Combo Action: Spiral Blow
Combo Potency: 300
Rear Combo Potency: 340
Combo Bonus: Damage over time
Potency: 45
Duration: 24s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Wyrmwind Thrust
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 440 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Firstminds' Focus Cost: 2
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name:
Rise of the Dragon
Prerequisite Quest
jobActions.description:
Deals physical damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 550 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Dragon's Flight.

jobActions.name: Lance Barrage
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130.
Combo Action: True Thrust or Raiden Thrust
Combo Potency: 340

jobActions.name: Spiral Blow
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: True Thrust or Raiden Thrust
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Grants Power Surge
Power Surge Effect: Increases damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Starcross
jobActions.description:
Deals physical damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Starcross Ready.

roleActions.name: Second Wind
roleActions.description:
Instantly restores own HP.
Cure Potency: 800
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Bloodbath
roleActions.description:
Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.
Duration: 20s

roleActions.name: Feint
roleActions.description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.description:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

roleActions.name: True North
roleActions.description:
Nullifies all action direction requirements.
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Enhanced Jump
traits.description: Increases the potency of Jump to 320.

traits.name: Life of the Dragon
traits.description:
Upgrades Blood of the Dragon to Life of the Dragon.
Life of the Dragon Effect: Increases damage dealt by 15%
Upon successfully landing Geirskogul, grants 3 stacks of Nastrond Ready.
Duration: 20s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Lance Mastery
traits.description:
Increases the potency of True Thrust to 230, Vorpal Thrust to 130, and Disembowel to 140.
Grants Draconian Fire if Drakesbane is executed following Fang and Claw or Wheeling Thrust.
Duration: 30s
Effect of Draconian Fire ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill.
Upgrades True Thrust to Raiden Thrust while under the effect of Draconian Fire.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Coerthan Torment
traits.description:
Grants the effect of Draconian Fire after successfully completing a combo with Coerthan Torment.
Duration: 30s
Effect of Draconian Fire ends upon execution of any melee weaponskill.
Upgrades Doom Spike to Draconian Fury while under the effect of Draconian Fire.

traits.name: Enhanced Winged Glide
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Winged Glide.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Lance Mastery II
traits.description:
Upgrades Full Thrust to Heavens' Thrust and Chaos Thrust to Chaotic Spring. Also increases the potency of Drakesbane to 400.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Life Surge
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Life Surge.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Lance Mastery III
traits.description:
Increases the potency of Geirskogul to 280 and Nastrond to 360.
Allows for the sharpening of the Firstminds' Focus upon successfully landing Raiden Thrust or Draconian Fury, up to a maximum of 2 units.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Dragonfire Dive
traits.description:
Grants Dragon's Flight upon executing Dragonfire Dive.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Melee Mastery
traits.description: Increases the potency of Fang and Claw to 140, Wheeling Thrust to 140, Drakesbane to 440, Raiden Thrust to 320, Stardiver to 720, Heavens' Thrust to 140, Chaotic Spring to 140, and Wyrmwind Thrust to 440.

traits.name: Lance Mastery IV
traits.description: Upgrades Vorpal Thrust to Lance Barrage and Disembowel to Spiral Blow.

traits.name: Enhanced Stardiver
traits.description:
Grants Starcross Ready upon executing Stardiver.
Duration: 20s
Effect ends when Life of the Dragon expires.
